<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Load Incident state and priority chart colors from the com.snc.incident.updates plugin only if the instance does not have sys_report_chart_color records already defined for the incident table's state and priority field</description>
        <name>Load Incident state priority chart color</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var stateChartColorExist = false;
    var priorityChartColorExist = false;

    var ga = new GlideAggregate("sys_report_chart_color");
    ga.addQuery("name", "incident");
    ga.addQuery("element", "IN", "state,priority");
    ga.addAggregate("COUNT");
    ga.groupBy("element");
    ga.query();
    while (ga.next()) {
        if (ga.getValue("element") == "state")
            stateChartColorExist = true;
        else if (ga.getValue("element") == "priority")
            priorityChartColorExist = true;
    }
    if (!stateChartColorExist) {
        gs.log("Loading sys_report_chart_color for incident.state", "[com.snc.incident.updates][Fix Script: Load Incident state priority chart color]");
        GlideUpdateManager2().load("com.snc.incident.updates", "update.chart_colors_state");
    }
    if (!priorityChartColorExist) {
        gs.log("Loading sys_report_chart_color for incident.priority", "[com.snc.incident.updates][Fix Script: Load Incident state priority chart color]");
        GlideUpdateManager2().load("com.snc.incident.updates", "update.chart_colors_priority");
    }
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
